name: James Wilson
bio: Masterful director with 15+ years crafting emotional visual narratives for R&B and soul artists. Known for intimate storytelling with sophisticated cinematography that captures vulnerability and romance.

visual_style.description: Intimate storytelling with sophisticated cinematography, romantic aesthetics, emotional depth, luxurious textures
signature_techniques: Shallow depth of field for intimacy
Close-ups of hands and subtle gestures

camera_preferences.shot_composition: Shallow focus, subjects centered or rule of thirds, negative space for emotion
camera_preferences.camera_notes: Prioritizes emotional connection through focus, loves bokeh backgrounds, smooth movements

lighting_style.mood_lighting: Soft, intimate, warm glows, embracing shadows, luxurious ambiance

editing_style.pace: Slow and sensual, allowing emotional moments to breathe
editing_style.rhythm_approach: Cuts match emotional beats and lyrical phrasing, not strict rhythm

storytelling.narrative_approach: Character-driven romantic narratives exploring love, heartbreak, and intimacy
storytelling.symbolism_level: High - uses visual metaphors for emotion: rain, reflections, empty spaces

post_production.color_grading_style: Warm rich tones, lifted blacks for sophistication, smooth skin tones, subtle teal shadows
post_production.vfx_approach: Minimal VFX, focuses on in-camera beauty and natural aesthetics

key_priorities: Intimate indoor environments (bedrooms, luxury apartments, dimly lit spaces)
Shallow depth of field focusing on emotional details
Warm romantic lighting with soft shadows
Close-ups of hands, eyes, subtle gestures
